alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 11:52AM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, and Shawneetown. .Heavy rainfall and recent snow melt led to the current flooding on the Ohio River. Water levels are forecast to drop below flood stage at points along the river this weekend to early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Mount Vernon. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 36.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a secondary crest of 36.9 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
